originalText.text: I have several friends who have done procedures with Dr. Imber and they all look fresh ,natural and youthful.  I do plenty of skin care and use every Youth Corridor product and I live for them. When I do get something major or minor done it will without a doubt be with Dr. Imber because I‚Äôve seen his magic . The people on the office treat their patients like family and are so kind , welcoming and discreet . If you see me wink but don‚Äôt say hi üòÇ. (Kidding) Kara

originalText.text: I am so happy that I found Dr Imber . I have been with Youth Corridor for about 2.5 years now and my skin has never been smoother, younger or more beautiful. I have been in for Dermaplanning which is a miracle worker , cleaning up all peach fuzz and removing the dead skin layer , leaving my skin smooth and fresh. I also do Botox with Dr Imber , and this for me is a game changer , he makes sure my Botox is natural looking and i still look 10 years younger afterwards , I like to go in every 3 months for this. Another treatment I Love is PRP , i have seen such a difference in my skin after this treatment , as it increases Collagen , which i desperately need. I also suffer from Rosacea so once a year i go for laser treatment at Dr Imber and this really reduces the redness in my face , so this is a very important treatment that i need to have . Overall I have had the best experience at Youth Corridor , not only with Dr Imber but his entire team are exceptional . Thank you so much for all that you have done for my skin !

originalText.text: Dr. Imber and his team are the best!  He has had a huge impact on how I approach aging. His book ‚ÄúThe New Youth Corridor‚Äù gives a holistic approach to healthy skin. I feel his main focus is on how to gracefully age and be your best self.  I highly trust him and his team. I am happy to give the highest recommendation to Dr. Imber and the very special team he works with.

originalText.text:
I have been coming to Dr.Imber‚Äôs office for several years. I simply cannot imagine having my cosmetic needs by anyone other than Dr. Imber regardless if I had to travel anywhere in a country to see him. His extremely skilled hands and superb taste always deliver the finest looking youthful and healthy results.
It has been my experience that his staff has always treated me with professional and accommodating service.
In addition, I can also swear by Dr.Imber‚Äôs skin care line ‚Äú Youth Corridor‚Äù. My skin never looked so flawless and radiant before!

originalText.text: Dr Imber + The Youth Corridor Practice is fantastic! Their staff is always warm and accommodating.  One of my favorite procedures is their no peel peel - where they derma plane, then laser, and then complete it with a light peel that won't leave you peeling for days afterwords. Leaves your skin looking brighter + refreshed after every appointment!
